thread.title_full: Nauru’s ‘Open’ Australian-run Detention Centre (Amnesty International Australia) - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Nauru’s ‘Open’ Australian-run Detention Centre (Amnesty International Australia)
text: ( Source : Amnesty International Australia ) Amnesty International is hopeful that a recent announcement by Nauru 's government will begin to reduce the stress and abuse imposed on asylum seekers detained at the Australian-run detention centre
